objects.name: Friend/Follow/Connect to targets of interest
objects.description:
Once a persona has been developed an adversary will use it to create connections to targets of interest. These connections may be direct or may include trying to connect through others. (Citation: NEWSCASTER2014) (Citation: BlackHatRobinSage)

Detectable by Common Defenses: No

Difficulty for the Adversary: Yes

external_references.description: Mike Lennon. (2014, May 29). Iranian Hackers Targeted US Officials in Elaborate Social Media Attack Operation. Retrieved March 1, 2017.
Thomas Ryan. (2010). “Getting In Bed with Robin Sage.”. Retrieved March 6, 2017.
